verses.verse: לְמַחְלְק֖וֹת <S%H4256><s%> Concerning the divisions לְשֹׁעֲרִ֑ים <S%H7778><s%> of the porters לַקָּרְחִ֕ים <S%H7145><s%> Of the Korhites מְשֶֽׁלֶמְיָ֥הוּ <S%H4920><s%> [was] Meshelemiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son קֹרֵ֖א <S%H6981><s%> of Kore מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the sons אָסָֽף׃ <S%H623><s%> of Asaph

וְלִמְשֶֽׁלֶמְיָ֖הוּ <S%H4920><s%> of Meshelemiah בָּנִ֑ים <S%H1121><s%> And the sons זְכַרְיָ֤הוּ <S%H2148><s%> [were] Zechariah הַבְּכוֹר֙ <S%H1060><s%> the firstborn יְדִֽיעֲאֵ֣ל <S%H3043><s%> Jediael הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <S%H8145><s%> the second זְבַדְיָ֙הוּ֙ <S%H2069><s%> Zebadiah הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֔י <S%H7992><s%> the third יַתְנִיאֵ֖ל <S%H3496><s%> Jathniel הָרְבִיעִֽי׃ <S%H7243><s%> the fourth

עֵילָ֤ם <S%H5867><s%> Elam הַחֲמִישִׁי֙ <S%H2549><s%> the fifth יְהוֹחָנָ֣ן <S%H3076><s%> Jehohanan הַשִּׁשִּׁ֔י <S%H8345><s%> the sixth אֶלְיְהוֹעֵינַ֖י <S%H454><s%> Elioenai הַשְּׁבִיעִֽי׃ <S%H7637><s%> the seventh

וּלְעֹבֵ֥ד אֱדֹ֖ם <S%H5654><s%> of Obededom בָּנִ֑ים <S%H1121><s%> Moreover the sons שְׁמַֽעְיָ֤ה <S%H8098><s%> [were] Shemaiah הַבְּכוֹר֙ <S%H1060><s%> the firstborn יְהוֹזָבָ֣ד <S%H3075><s%> Jehozabad הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <S%H8145><s%> the second יוֹאָ֤ח <S%H3098><s%> Joah הַשְּׁלִשִׁי֙ <S%H7992><s%> the third וְשָׂכָ֣ר <S%H7940><s%> and Sacar הָרְבִיעִ֔י <S%H7243><s%> the fourth וּנְתַנְאֵ֖ל <S%H5417><s%> and Nethaneel הַחֲמִישִֽׁי׃ <S%H2549><s%> the fifth

עַמִּיאֵ֤ל <S%H5988><s%> Ammiel הַשִּׁשִּׁי֙ <S%H8345><s%> the sixth יִשָׂשכָ֣ר <S%H3485><s%> Issachar הַשְּׁבִיעִ֔י <S%H7637><s%> the seventh פְּעֻלְּתַ֖י <S%H6469><s%> Peulthai הַשְּׁמִינִ֑י <S%H8066><s%> the eighth כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> had indeed בֵרֲכ֖וֹ <S%H1288><s%> blessed אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> for God פ

וְלִֽשְׁמַֽעְיָ֤ה <S%H8098><s%> Also unto Shemaiah בְנוֹ֙ <S%H1121><s%> his son נוֹלַ֣ד <S%H3205><s%> born בָּנִ֔ים <S%H1121><s%> were sons הַמִּמְשָׁלִ֖ים <S%H4474><s%> that ruled לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> throughout the house אֲבִיהֶ֑ם <S%H1><s%> of their father כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for גִבּ֥וֹרֵי <S%H1368><s%> for they [were] mighty men חַ֖יִל <S%H2428><s%> of valour הֵֽמָּה׃ <S%H1992><s%> like

בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> The sons שְׁמַֽעְיָ֗ה <S%H8098><s%> of Shemaiah עָ֠תְנִי <S%H6273><s%> Othni וּרְפָאֵ֨ל <S%H7501><s%> and Rephael וְעוֹבֵ֧ד <S%H5744><s%> and Obed אֶלְזָבָ֛ד <S%H443><s%> Elzabad אֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> whose brethren בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> men חָ֑יִל <S%H2428><s%> [were] strong אֱלִיה֖וּ <S%H453><s%> Elihu וּסְמַכְיָֽהוּ׃ <S%H5565><s%> and Semachiah

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner אֵ֜לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these מִבְּנֵ֣י ׀ <S%H1121><s%> All these of the sons עֹבֵ֣ד אֱדֹ֗ם <S%H5654><s%> of Obededom הֵ֤מָּה <S%H1992><s%> they וּבְנֵיהֶם֙ <S%H1121><s%> they and their sons וַאֲחֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H251><s%> and their brethren אִֽישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> men חַ֥יִל <S%H2428><s%> able בַּכֹּ֖חַ <S%H3581><s%> for strength לַעֲבֹדָ֑ה <S%H5656><s%> for the service שִׁשִּׁ֥ים <S%H8346><s%> [were] threescore וּשְׁנַ֖יִם <S%H8147><s%> and two לְעֹבֵ֥ד אֱדֹֽם׃ <S%H5654><s%> of Obededom

וְלִמְשֶֽׁלֶמְיָ֗הוּ <S%H4920><s%> And Meshelemiah בָּנִ֧ים <S%H1121><s%> had sons וְאַחִ֛ים <S%H251><s%> and brethren בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> men חָ֖יִל <S%H2428><s%> strong שְׁמוֹנָ֥ה <S%H8083><s%> eight עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> teen ס

וּלְחֹסָ֥ה <S%H2621><s%> Also Hosah מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children מְרָרִ֖י <S%H4847><s%> of Merari בָּנִ֑ים <S%H1121><s%> had sons שִׁמְרִ֤י <S%H8113><s%> Simri הָרֹאשׁ֙ <S%H7218><s%> the chief כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not הָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> was not בְכ֔וֹר <S%H1060><s%> (for [though] he was not the firstborn וַיְשִׂימֵ֥הוּ <S%H7760><s%> made אָבִ֖יהוּ <S%H1><s%> yet his father לְרֹֽאשׁ׃ <S%H7218><s%> the first

חִלְקִיָּ֤הוּ <S%H2518><s%> Hilkiah הַשֵּׁנִי֙ <S%H8145><s%> the second טְבַלְיָ֣הוּ <S%H2882><s%> Tebaliah הַשְּׁלִשִׁ֔י <S%H7992><s%> the third זְכַרְיָ֖הוּ <S%H2148><s%> Zechariah הָרְבִעִ֑י <S%H7243><s%> the fourth כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בָּנִ֧ים <S%H1121><s%> all the sons וְאַחִ֛ים <S%H251><s%> and brethren לְחֹסָ֖ה <S%H2621><s%> of Hosah שְׁלֹשָׁ֥ה <S%H7969><s%> three עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> ten

לְ֠אֵלֶּה <S%H428><s%> to these מַחְלְק֨וֹת <S%H4256><s%> Among these [were] the divisions הַשֹּֽׁעֲרִ֜ים <S%H7778><s%> of the porters לְרָאשֵׁ֧י <S%H7218><s%> [even] among the chief הַגְּבָרִ֛ים <S%H1397><s%> men מִשְׁמָר֖וֹת <S%H4931><s%> [having] wards לְעֻמַּ֣ת <S%H5980><s%> one against אֲחֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H251><s%> another לְשָׁרֵ֖ת <S%H8334><s%> to minister בְּבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> in the house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וַיַּפִּ֨ילוּ <S%H5307><s%> And they cast גוֹרָל֜וֹת <S%H1486><s%> lots כַּקָּטֹ֧ן <S%H6996><s%> as well the small כַּגָּד֛וֹל <S%H1419><s%> as the great לְבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> according to the house אֲבוֹתָ֖ם <S%H1><s%> of their fathers לְשַׁ֥עַר <S%H8179><s%> for every gate וָשָֽׁעַר׃ <S%H8179><s%> gate פ

וַיִּפֹּ֧ל <S%H5307><s%> fell הַגּוֹרָ֛ל <S%H1486><s%> And the lot מִזְרָ֖חָה <S%H4217><s%> eastward לְשֶֽׁלֶמְיָ֑הוּ <S%H8018><s%> to Shelemiah וּזְכַרְיָ֨הוּ <S%H2148><s%> Then for Zechariah בְנ֜וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son יוֹעֵ֣ץ ׀ <S%H3289><s%> counsellor בְּשֶׂ֗כֶל <S%H7922><s%> a wise הִפִּ֙ילוּ֙ <S%H5307><s%> they cast גּֽוֹרָל֔וֹת <S%H1486><s%> lots וַיֵּצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> came out גוֹרָל֖וֹ <S%H1486><s%> and his lot צָפֽוֹנָה׃ <S%H6828><s%> northward ס
לְעֹבֵ֥ד אֱדֹ֖ם <S%H5654><s%> To Obededom נֶ֑גְבָּה <S%H5045><s%> southward וּלְבָנָ֖יו <S%H1121><s%> and to his sons בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> the house הָאֲסֻפִּֽים׃ <S%H624><s%> of Asuppim

לְשֻׁפִּ֤ים <S%H8206><s%> To Shuppim וּלְחֹסָה֙ <S%H2621><s%> and Hosah לַֽמַּעֲרָ֔ב <S%H4628><s%> [the lot came forth] westward עִ֚ם <S%H5973><s%> by שַׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> with the gate שַׁלֶּ֔כֶת <S%H7996><s%> Shallecheth בַּֽמְסִלָּ֖ה <S%H4546><s%> by the causeway הָעוֹלָ֑ה <S%H5927><s%> of the going up מִשְׁמָ֖ר <S%H4929><s%> ward לְעֻמַּ֥ת <S%H5980><s%> against מִשְׁמָֽר׃ <S%H4929><s%> ward

לַמִּזְרָח֮ <S%H4217><s%> Eastward הַלְוִיִּ֣ם <S%H3881><s%> Levites שִׁשָּׁה֒ <S%H8337><s%> [were] six לַצָּפ֤וֹנָה <S%H6828><s%> northward לַיּוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> a day אַרְבָּעָ֔ה <S%H702><s%> four לַנֶּ֥גְבָּה <S%H5045><s%> southward לַיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> a day אַרְבָּעָ֑ה <S%H702><s%> four וְלָאֲסֻפִּ֖ים <S%H624><s%> and toward Asuppim שְׁנַ֥יִם <S%H8147><s%> two שְׁנָֽיִם׃ <S%H8147><s%> [and] two

לַפַּרְבָּ֖ר <S%H6503><s%> At Parbar לַֽמַּעֲרָ֑ב <S%H4628><s%> westward אַרְבָּעָה֙ <S%H702><s%> four לַֽמְסִלָּ֔ה <S%H4546><s%> at the causeway שְׁנַ֖יִם <S%H8147><s%> [and] two לַפַּרְבָּֽר׃ <S%H6503><s%> at Parbar

אֵ֗לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These מַחְלְקוֹת֙ <S%H4256><s%> These [are] the divisions הַשֹּׁ֣עֲרִ֔ים <S%H7778><s%> of the porters לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> among the sons הַקָּרְחִ֖י <S%H7145><s%> of Kore וְלִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> and among the sons מְרָרִֽי׃ <S%H4847><s%> of Merari

וְֽהַלְוִיִּ֑ם <S%H3881><s%> And of the Levites אֲחִיָּ֗ה <S%H281><s%> Ahijah עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> had charge אֽוֹצְרוֹת֙ <S%H214><s%> [was] over the treasures בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> of God וּלְאֹֽצְר֖וֹת <S%H214><s%> and over the treasures הַקֳּדָשִֽׁים׃ <S%H6944><s%> of the dedicated things

בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> [As concerning] the sons לַ֠עְדָּן <S%H3936><s%> of Laadan בְּנֵ֨י <S%H1121><s%> the sons הַגֵּרְשֻׁנִּ֜י <S%H1649><s%> of the Gershonite לְלַעְדָּ֗ן <S%H3936><s%> Laadan רָאשֵׁ֧י <S%H7218><s%> chief הָאָב֛וֹת <S%H1><s%> fathers לְלַעְדָּ֥ן <S%H3936><s%> [even] of Laadan הַגֵּרְשֻׁנִּ֖י <S%H1649><s%> the Gershonite יְחִיאֵלִֽי׃ <S%H3172><s%> [were] Jehieli

בְּנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> The sons יְחִֽיאֵלִ֑י <S%H3172><s%> of Jehieli זֵתָם֙ <S%H2241><s%> Zetham וְיוֹאֵ֣ל <S%H3100><s%> and Joel אָחִ֔יו <S%H251><s%> his brother עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> had charge אֹצְר֖וֹת <S%H214><s%> [which were] over the treasures בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD
לַֽעַמְרָמִי֙ <S%H6020><s%> Of the Amramites לַיִּצְהָרִ֔י <S%H3325><s%> [and] the Izharites לַֽחֶבְרוֹנִ֖י <S%H2276><s%> the Hebronites לָֽעָזִּיאֵלִֽי׃ <S%H5817><s%> [and] the Uzzielites

וּשְׁבֻאֵל֙ <S%H7619><s%> And Shebuel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son גֵּרְשׁ֣וֹם <S%H1647><s%> of Gershom בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> of Moses נָגִ֖יד <S%H5057><s%> [was] ruler עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הָאֹצָרֽוֹת׃ <S%H214><s%> of the treasures

וְאֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> And his brethren לֶֽאֱלִיעֶ֑זֶר <S%H461><s%> by Eliezer רְחַבְיָ֨הוּ <S%H7345><s%> Rehabiah בְנ֜וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son וִֽישַׁעְיָ֤הוּ <S%H3470><s%> and Jeshaiah בְנוֹ֙ <S%H1121><s%> his son וְיֹרָ֣ם <S%H3141><s%> and Joram בְּנ֔וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son וְזִכְרִ֥י <S%H2147><s%> and Zichri בְנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son [וּשְׁלֹמֹות כ] (וּשְׁלֹמִ֥ית <S%H8013><s%> Shelomith ק) בְּנֽוֹ׃ <S%H1121><s%> his son

ה֧וּא <S%H1931><s%> This שְׁלֹמ֣וֹת <S%H8013><s%> Which Shelomith וְאֶחָ֗יו <S%H251><s%> and his brethren עַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> had charge כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all אֹצְר֤וֹת <S%H214><s%> [were] over all the treasures הַקֳּדָשִׁים֙ <S%H6944><s%> of the dedicated things אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which הִקְדִּ֜ישׁ <S%H6942><s%> had dedicated דָּוִ֣יד <S%H1732><s%> which David הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king וְרָאשֵׁ֧י <S%H7218><s%> and the chief הָאָב֛וֹת <S%H1><s%> fathers לְשָׂרֵֽי־ <S%H8269><s%> the captains הָאֲלָפִ֥ים <S%H505><s%> over thousands וְהַמֵּא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> and hundreds וְשָׂרֵ֥י <S%H8269><s%> and the captains הַצָּבָֽא׃ <S%H6635><s%> of the host

מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> in הַמִּלְחָמ֥וֹת <S%H4421><s%> won in battles וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> part הַשָּׁלָ֖ל <S%H7998><s%> Out of the spoils הִקְדִּ֑ישׁוּ <S%H6942><s%> did they dedicate לְחַזֵּ֖ק <S%H2388><s%> to maintain לְבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> the house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וְכֹ֨ל <S%H3605><s%> and all הַֽהִקְדִּ֜ישׁ <S%H6942><s%> had dedicated שְׁמוּאֵ֤ל <S%H8050><s%> And all that Samuel הָרֹאֶה֙ <S%H7200><s%> the seer וְשָׁא֣וּל <S%H7586><s%> and Saul בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son קִ֔ישׁ <S%H7027><s%> of Kish וְאַבְנֵ֣ר <S%H74><s%> and Abner בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נֵ֔ר <S%H5369><s%> of Ner וְיוֹאָ֖ב <S%H3097><s%> and Joab בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son צְרוּיָ֑ה <S%H6870><s%> of Zeruiah כֹּ֚ל <S%H3605><s%> everyone הַמַּקְדִּ֔ישׁ <S%H6942><s%> [and] whosoever had dedicated עַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> was in יַד־ <S%H3027><s%> [any thing it was] under the hand שְׁלֹמִ֖ית <S%H8019><s%> of Shelomith וְאֶחָֽיו׃ <S%H251><s%> and of his brethren פ
